summary: Team-oriented Engineering Associate with over 8 years experience designing, developing, maintaining, and testing electro-mechanical systems.
skills: Ability to write and read wiring diagram

experience.title: Engineering Associate
experience.description: Engineering Associate responsible for product reliability, improvement, and NPD qualification in the Digital Radiography department; wrote test protocols, conducted testing, analyzed data, and reported findings. Also performed lab maintenance, ESD testing, and managed obsolescences and validation testing; trained new personnel; served as hardware subject matter expert for CR and DR instruments; designed components and test fixtures; oversaw technicians and interns; collaborated with suppliers and customers; cross-functional team member; familiar with software and system integration.

experience.title: Electrical Technician and Mechanist
experience.description: Resolved part and assembly discrepancies; collaborated with engineers and project managers on design parameters for client projects; designed brackets and custom framing for automated machines; prepared material specifications for purchasing; debugged and troubleshot analog, digital, and RF circuits; worked with and troubleshooted PLCs and assembly lines to maintain productivity; assembled complex electrical circuits (AC and DC).
